title: IVY CITY COMMUNITY CENTER
description: Stabilize the Crummell School building and convert it to a recreation and community center.
justification: In recent years the Ivy City community has seen investment in its housing stock, with over 58 new units nearing completion by nonprofit developers Manna Inc, Mi Casa and DC Habitat for Humanity.  Yet the centerpiece and civic heart of the community, the Alexander Crummell School, continues to sit vacant.  In addition, City neighborhood, which is currently without access to recreation and similar community amenities.  Restoring Crummell School for active recreation and community use is central to the revitalization of the Ivy City community.
